snippet: Yelp, the crowd-sourced company specializing in online reviews, is wading into the national debate over transgender people's bathroom access with a new feature that will enable consumers to search for businesses offering gender-neutral restrooms....

headline.main: Trump to Host Germany's Merkel at the White House
headline.print_headline: Trump to Host Germany's Merkel at the White House

lead_paragraph: Yelp, the crowd-sourced company specializing in online reviews, is wading into the national debate over transgender people's bathroom access with a new feature that will enable consumers to search for businesses offering gender-neutral restrooms.
